ingredients.name: Half inch thick Pullman or white bread
Thinly sliced American or cheddar cheese

steps.instruction: Place bread on a cutting board and spread mayonnaise over top side of each; this is key to a golden, delectable crunch.
Heat a small skillet (nonstick, ideally) over medium heat.
When it melts, place 1 slice of bread, mayonnaise side down, in skillet; top with cheese; season with pepper.
Top with second slice of bread, mayonnaise side up.
When underside is golden brown, about 4 minutes, turn sandwich and add remaining butter to skillet.
Press down on sandwich to encourage even browning and to help melt cheeseâ€”be gentle, don't smash it.
Cook until second side is golden brown and cheese is melted.
